top_stories.title: Illumina Launches Scalable Software for Connected Multiomic Analysis
top_stories.description: Integrated software, AI-driven analytics, and frictionless workflows enable customers to harness the full power of biological insights Illumina, Inc. (NASDAQ: ILMN) today announced the release of Illumina Connected Multiomics, a powerful cloud-based research software platform to analyze and visualize multiomic and multimodal biological data at scale. As multiomic datasets grow rapidly... The post Illumina Launches Scalable Software for Connected Multiomic Analysis first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.content: Integrated software, AI-driven analytics, and frictionless workflows enable customers to harness the full power of biological insights Illumina, Inc. top_stories.title: Faster treatments and support for health workers as AI tackles A&E bottlenecks
top_stories.description: AI tool helping 50 NHS organisations predict A&E demand this winter, speeding up patient care as government delivers on building an NHS fit for the future.
